verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> that came unto <S%H1954>Hosea<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H882>Beeri<s%>, in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%>, <S%H3147>Jotham<s%>, <S%H271>Ahaz<s%>, and <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%>, <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

The <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the <S%H1696>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H1954>Hosea<s%>. And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1954>Hosea<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> unto you a <S%H802>wife<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%> and <S%H3206>sons<s%> of <S%H2183>whoredoms<s%>: for the <S%H776>land<s%> has committed <S%H2181>great<s%> <S%H2181>whoredom<s%>, departing <S%H310>from<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
So he <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H1586>Gomer<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H1691>Diblaim<s%>; which <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bore<s%> him a <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7121>him<s%>, Call his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>; for yet a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H6485>while<s%>, and I will avenge the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3058>Jehu<s%>, and will cause to <S%H7673>cease<s%> the <S%H4468>kingdom<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And it shall come to pass at that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I will <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H7198>bow<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.

And she conceived <S%H2029>again<s%>, and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1323>daughter<s%>. And God <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7121>him<s%>, Call her <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3819>Lo<s%>–ruhamah: for I will no <S%H3254>more<s%> have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; but I will <S%H5375>utterly<s%> take them <S%H5375>away<s%>.

But I will have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and will <S%H3467>save<s%> them by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>, and will not <S%H3467>save<s%> them by <S%H7198>bow<s%>, nor by <S%H2719>sword<s%>, nor by <S%H4421>battle<s%>, by <S%H5483>horses<s%>, nor by <S%H6571>horsemen<s%>.
Now when she had <S%H1580>weaned<s%> <S%H3819>Lo<s%>–ruhamah, she <S%H2029>conceived<s%>, and <S%H3205>bore<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>.
Then <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H7121>God<s%>, Call his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3818>Lo<s%>–ammi: for you are not my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will not be your God.

Yet the <S%H4557>number<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall be as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, which cannot be <S%H4058>measured<s%> nor <S%H5608>numbered<s%>; and it shall come to <S%H4725>pass<s%>, that in the place where it was <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5971>them<s%>, You are not my people, there it shall be <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H1121>them<s%>, You are the sons of the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>.

Then shall the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>, and <S%H7760>appoint<s%> themselves <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%>, and they shall come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>: for <S%H1419>great<s%> shall be the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>.
